fb.i: Football the game which contains two teams of usually between 11 and 18 players.

ct.i: Cricket originated as a children's game in the south-eastern counties of England during the medieval period.

hk.i: The India national field hockey team was the first non-European team to be a part of the International Hockey Federation.
info: 1928 - team won its first Olympic gold medal
Nickname - Men in Blue; Bharat Army

at.i: The most common types of athletics competitions are track and field, road running, cross country running, and race walking.
